name: FNF Monika Test
description:
FNF Monika Test

Ok, now it's time for the Monika test game, a new chapter from my collection of FNF Test Games.

In this fnf test you can see 5 different stages:

  1. Monika
  2. Monika and Senpai - where Senpai is singing
  3. Monika and Senpai - where Monika is singing
  4. Monika at the table
  5. Glitch Monika at the table
Can you name all the songs from this fnf test game?

Controls:

  • N - next animation
  • M - mute
  • A - cut scene with Girlfriend and Boyfriend
  • S - cut scene with Girlfriend Error GF NOT FOUND!
  • D - Monika bow
  • Backspace - go back
  • Arrows - sing the vocals
This is just a test version of the game where all the fans can test their favorite FNF characters.

---

Credits for Artwork, Sounds, Vocals, Ideas go to the original mod creators. 

Artists: DusterBuster, TokyoGalaxy

Programming: aetherdx, SunSpirit

Music: Kallionic, CelShader, Galactigal, Retro Gaming

Special Thanks: ash237, Blantados, Cval, Dan Salvato, foomf, Lumitic, J8khero, KadeDeveloper, Matt$, Zeexel

Download original Monika Full Week Rebooted! - Friday Night Funkin' from GB: https://gamebanana.com/mods/47364

Play online: https://www.play-games.com/game/27334/friday-night-funkin-vs-monika-ddlc.html
